casebody.data:
No. 622,

Misc.

Grisham v. Taylor, Warden. H. Clay Espey for petitioner. Solicitor General Rankin for respondent.

Mb-tions for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and to substitute Charles R. Hagan, Warden, in the place of John C. Taylor, Warden, as the party respondent granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted.
